plot outline: A fearless and forthright young man, working in Mumbai travels to his ancestral village to meet his uncle's daughter and marry her. However, when she is abducted by the son of the local MLA, who tries to rape her, it's time for him to team up with his uncle and ensure that the anti-social elements in the village are cleaned out. Will the dynamic duo succeed in defeating their powerful enemies?
title: Dhamak
plot: A fearless and forthright young man, working in Mumbai travels to his ancestral village to meet his uncle's daughter and marry her. However, when she is abducted by the son of the local MLA, who tries to rape her, it's time for him to team up with his uncle and ensure that the anti-social elements in the village are cleaned out. Will the dynamic duo succeed in defeating their powerful enemies?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
